title: Schools working with curriculum frameworks
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: Trevor Lunn introduces a panel including Dr. Max Stephens, Anne Gooding, Mary Weaven, Enid Mayfield, Geoff Whyte, Denis Cunningham and Geoff Burt who explain how the key ideas and issues of Curriculum Frameworks are being addressed by Schools. This panel of teachers and regional consultants discuss several specific frameworks areas.
